name: Balls Shooter Legend 2
description:
Balls Shooter Legend 2 is an addictive bubble shooter game with 200+ puzzles, join millions now in the best free bubble popper game ever!
How to Play:
1.Tap where you want to pop bubble
2.To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst
3.Clear all the bubbles on the screen to level up,and try to get 3 stars on each level.
